function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to accurate information leading to misinformation and panic","Impact":"Increased spread of infectious diseases due to misinformation","Mitigation":"Ensure accessible, reliable, and up-to-date information sources","Technologies":"Mobile apps, social media platforms, official websites","People":"General public","Owner":"Government health authorities, tech companies"},{"Description":"Cybersecurity breaches leading to dissemination of false information","Impact":"Spread of false health advice and panic among the population","Mitigation":"Implement strong cybersecurity measures and verify information sources","Technologies":"Encryption, secure communication platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Tech companies, cybersecurity experts"}]}
